overview:
Todd J. Higgerson is an Associate at Commonwealth Capital Ventures. Before joining Commonwealth, Todd was an Analyst on the investment team at Chrysalis Ventures of Louisville, KY, a $250 million early and expansion stage venture capital firm focused on media and communications, healthcare services, and business services companies in the Southeast and Midwest.

Todd is a 2004 graduate of Yale University. He holds a B.S. in Economics and Engineering Sciences (Electrical). At Yale, he was part of a College Student Investment Group that managed more than $250,000 in funds for the university through investments in public equities.
